title: I love the fact Yi can 2 hit an APC, with no counterplay.

replies.body: Yi is shit against anyone that can stun then burst.
Q into Garen for free teleport to base

Idk you have roughly 10 to 15 mins from the start of the game to invade and waste him, over and over.

Or just save 1 CC to prepare for when he dares to show his face during TF.

Or build things like idk, thornmail or any actual defense?

And are you seriously surprised that an APC gets 2 hit, especially when it comes from a melee carry?

EDIT: Before you complain about his Q, you should check its CD first, it really isn't that good unless the Yi is already super fed to begin with.
